sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO BD_VAL_STD_PRICE
( STDYY, SN, BULD_STLE, BULD_PRPOS, BULD_RESCUE, BULD_LC, BULD_RF, ADSTRD_CODE, ADRES, LNM, SLNO, BULDDONG, BDH, THING_PAPR_ADRES, TOTAR, PRVUSE_AR, CMNUSE_AR, COMPET_DE, STUDY_UPPT_LNDCGR, LAD_AR, MKTC_STD_AM, MGC_NM, DATA_STDR_DE )
VALUES ( #stdyy#, (SELECT NVL(MAX(SN), 0)+1 FROM BD_VAL_STD_PRICE WHERE STDYY=#stdyy#), #buldStle#, #buldPrpos#, #buldRescue#, #buldLc#, #buldRf#, #adstrdCode#, #adres#, #lnm#, #slno#, #bulddong#, #bdh#, #thingPaprAdres#, #totar#, #prvuseAr#, #cmnuseAr#, TO_DATE(#competDe#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #studyUpptLndcgr#, #ladAr#, #mktcStdAm#, #mgcNm#, #dataStdrDe# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BD_VAL_STD_PRICE SET BULD_STLE = #buldStle#, BULD_PRPOS = #buldPrpos#, BULD_RESCUE = #buldRescue#, BULD_LC = #buldLc#, BULD_RF = #buldRf#, ADSTRD_CODE = #adstrdCode#, ADRES=#adres#, LNM = #lnm#, SLNO = #slno#, BULDDONG = #bulddong#, BDH = #bdh#, THING_PAPR_ADRES = #thingPaprAdres#, TOTAR = #totar#, PRVUSE_AR = #prvuseAr#, CMNUSE_AR = #cmnuseAr#, COMPET_DE = TO_DATE(#competDe#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), STUDY_UPPT_LNDCGR = #studyUpptLndcgr#, LAD_AR = #ladAr#, MKTC_STD_AM = #mktcStdAm#, MGC_NM = #mgcNm#, DATA_STDR_DE = #dataStdrDe# WHERE STDYY = #stdyy# AND SN = #sn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BD_VAL_STD_PRICE WHERE STDYY = #stdyy#, AND SN = #sn#
